file_content.text: We've got a problem. The Dust Viper gang ambushed one of our Alliance patrols--and made off with Odessen security data. Now they're selling it to the highest bidder.
The Dust Vipers' raiding days are over. Good news for us--and for the Outer Rim.
We can shut down those vicious scum bags, but you'll need to hit them hard. And fast.
Stomp into the Dust Vipers' den, and take down their leader, Bel Nerodia. Then recover our data. Can't forget that.
Of course, we can't forget the best news of all: you stopped our data from falling into enemy hands. The Alliance base is safe.
Now that's what I call a victory. The underworld's already buzzing with stories about how you wiped the Dust Vipers off the map.
And with our data secure, the Alliance doesn't have to worry about another attack.
You did some real good today. Now kick back and celebrate. You've earned it.
We're stronger than ever. And if anyone forgets that, we'll break 'em in half--just like the Dust Vipers.
Well, well, well. The beast master Jai Quallo finally bites the dust.
If I were you, I'd use his transponder to get the local wildlife on your side. But that's just me.
There's a nasty character near your location. Goes by the name Rakesh the Foul.
He's a dangerous criminal, wanted in every sector. The Dust Vipers locked him up after he tried to chew off their leader's hand.
Take down Rakesh and you'll be doing the galaxy a favor.
So much for Rakesh. Can't say I'll miss the old scumbag.
Bel Nerodia can't run far. Secure that Alliance data, then you can cut off the Vipers' head.
